mapper.insert: insert into member (loginid, pw, name, nickname, phone, email, zipcode, address, address_detail, member_profile, last_login_date) values (#{loginId}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{zipcode}, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, #{profilePic}, #{last_login_date})
mapper.update: update member set pw=#{pw}, nickname=#{nickname}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, zipcode = #{zipcode}, address = #{address}, address_detail = #{addressDetail}, member_profile =#{profilePic} where id = #{id};
